DataElement.preferredName: Inpatient Day First Integer::100 Day Post Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Occurrence Total Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The total number of inpatient days in first 100 days post hematopoietic cell transplantation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient who is residing in the hospital where he is being treated._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds.  This also refers to a specific day._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::100_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds.  This also refers to a specific day._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The replacement of tissue with tissue from the person's own body or from another person._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient who is residing in the hospital where he is being treated.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.

Concepts.definition: A patient who is residing in the hospital where he is being treated.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Property.preferredName: First Integer::100 Day Post Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A number with no fractional part.::100:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:Post; occuring after.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete._To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ReferenceDocuments.description: What is the total number of inpatient days in first 100 days post hematopoietic cell transplantation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:2798234
ReferenceDocuments.description: SUM OF PerformedAdministrativeActivity.dateRange(IVL<TS.DATETIME>).width WHERE PerformedAdministrativeActivity > DefinedAdministrativeActivity.nameCode = "stay in hospital" [admitting and discharging are subactivities] AND PerformedAdministrativeActivity.dateRange(IVL<TS.DATETIME>).high [or portion of the timeframe] IS LESS THAN (PerformedSubstanceAdministration.dateRange(IVL<TS.DATETIME>).high + 100 DAYS)
